sweepers.description: HAAGA 477 SWEEPER sweep twice with one move. The two front brushes rotate in opposite directions grabbing the big debris directly in front of the sweeper while the brush roller on the bottom picks up all the small particles.
sweepers.designed: Designed for indoor / outdoor wide area surface cleaning of warehouse and factory flooring, parking lot and sidewalk surfaces, asphalt, concrete and all natural stone hard surfaces.

characteristics.description: 4 yr warranty on all brushes against wear

sweepers.description: Is used by hotels, motels, government, maintenance departments, recreational facilities, movie theaters and services stations all over the world, Since 1969

sweepers.description: Easily sweeps fine dust, course dirt, sand, leaves, sticks, bottles, broken glass, wrappers, food, anything that can fit thru a 10 X 4 opening big or small debris.

floorwash.description: The Namco Floorwash 1000 Multi-Surface Floor Scrubber is designed to clean both hard floor surfaces and carpets with a single pass, making it an efficient and versatile cleaning solution for any environment.
floorwash.designed: cleans grouted tile, concrete, marble, profiled ceramics, vinyl, rubberized, wood floors inside and outside. The Floorwash 1400B is Ideal for restaurants, hotels, bars, schools, offices, shops, convenience stores, medical centers as well as home use.

floorwash.description: The Floorwash 1400B Cordless Hard Surface Cleaner cleans grouted tile, concrete, marble, profiled ceramics, vinyl, rubberized, wood floors inside and outside.
floorwash.designed: cleans grouted tile, concrete, marble, profiled ceramics, vinyl, rubberized, wood floors inside and outside. The Floorwash 1400B is Ideal for restaurants, hotels, bars, schools, offices, shops, convenience stores, medical centers as well as home use.

floorwash.description: Namco Floorwash 5000 cleans 30 different floor types. Cleans carpets, grouted tile, concrete, hardwood, marble, profiled ceramics, vinyl, rubberized floors, Pirelli, escalators and more.
